name: Childhood
descriptionArr: Born: November 19, 1989
Went to Elementary School
Wanted to be Batman
Had unhealthy obsession with legos
Played many baseball, hockey, tennis, etc.
Learned to play the trombone
Had tonsils removed
Ate lots of candy

name: Teen Years
descriptionArr: Attended Staten Island Technical High School
Made lifelong friends
Played football, tennis, and acted in school play
Had first jobs / Wrote for the local newspaper
Fell in love with engineering
Still wanted to be Batman

name: College Years
descriptionArr: Attended the State University of New York at Binghamton
Had tumultuous but ultimately rewarding relationship with engineering
Made more lifelong friends
Played racquetball, logged many hours on the ski slopes
Became involved with Greek Life on Campus
Elected President of Theta Tau Professional Engineering Fraternity
Gave up dream of being Batman

name: Professional Career
descriptionArr: Became full stack developer
Lived in Murray Hill, then Upper East Side
Switch from racquetball to paddleball [$$$!]
Became obsessed with food truck culture, created corresponding blog
Started new Lord of the Rings-style quest for smarthome perfection. Barely made it out of the Shire.
Proclaimed undying love for javascript
New on-brand dream: Become Iron Man
